textTemplates.name: NSLEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.NSL__r.FirstName} {!$Record.NSL__r.LastName}, 

A new client {!$Record.NewClientNo__c} - {!$Record.Company} has been created in your sector through the {!$Record.LeadSource} channel. Please find the details below:

Propect Name :‎‎‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}

Prospect Email: ‎ ‎‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎   ‎ ‎{!$Record.Email}

Inquiry Description : ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ {!$Record.Description}

To access the record on LinKreta, please click on the link:

{!DetailPageLink}

Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.

textTemplates.name: SectorCoordinatorEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.SectorCoordinator__r.FirstName}{!$Record.SectorCoordinator__r.LastName},


New Client ({!$Record.NewClientNo__c}) - {!$Record.Company} Created Via "{!$Record.LeadSource}" Dated : {!CreatedDate} with following details :-

Name : ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎{!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}

Email : ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎{!$Record.Email}

Mobile No : ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎{!$Record.MobilePhone}

Company Name :‎‎‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎‎  ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎‎{!$Record.Company}

Sector : ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎{!$Record.Sector__c}

Remarks : ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎ ‎‎{!$Record.Remark__c}

To access the record into Salesforce, please click the link below:

{!DetailPageLink}

Please pick up the New Client record at the earliest

Thanks & Regards﻿

GT Team
